pixi.renderers.canvas.utils.CanvasBuffer

type
class
metadata
:native
"PIXI.CanvasBuffer"

Constructor

new(width : Float, height : Float)
parameters
width {Number} the width for the newly created canvas
height {Number} the height for the newly created canvas
Creates a Canvas element of the given size.

Instance Variables

canvas : js.html.CanvasElement

The Canvas object that belongs to this CanvasBuffer.

context : js.html.CanvasRenderingContext2D

A CanvasRenderingContext2D object representing a two-dimensional rendering context.

height : Float

The height of the Canvas in pixels.

width : Float

The width of the Canvas in pixels.

Instance Methods

resize(width : Float, height : Float) : Void

parameters
width {Number} the new width of the canvas
height {Number} the new height of the canvas
Resizes the canvas to the specified width and height.
